content.raw:
I believe we decided to go with a time based scoring for the navigation task.  One way to do this would be…

* Score starts at -1 \(no score\)
* Then vessel crosses first gate \(entrance\), capture simtime
* Have the score be the elapsed time since crossing the entrance.
* Add a time penalty for each collision - say 10 seconds

    * Would be nice if the collision time penalty was a plugin parameter
    
* If the vessel crosses a gate out of order, the score goes to -1
* If the vessel crosses the exit gate \(after crossing all the gates in order\), the score stops accumulating and the plugin transitions to finished state.
* If the max time is exceeded \(transitions to finished state without crossing the exit gate\) score goes to -1

You might consult the latest revision of the Task Descriptions document.
